text: @JoshFrydenberg I couldn't give a rat's furry arse if you had #COVID19 or not! Your still our worst Treasurer (along with @ScottMorrisonMP of course). You are a major player in the most CORRUPT Fed Govt in Australia's History. Oh & Joshy...#DebtAndDeficitDisaster !!! You Twat ! #auspol
